text: Most people can only dream of getting a chance to stay in the White House and Buckingham Palace. Some of the most influential and powerful people in the world have graced their halls, and they adorned with a splendor that us Average Joes can barely imagine. Few have had a chance to experience and compare both, but one of the lucky people who has is the former First Lady Michelle Obama. The 54 - year - old recently opened up about what it was like to spend the night in Buckingham Palace on a state visit in 2011. After Barack Obama's election in 2008, the family developed an extremely close bond with the British Royals.
